resources.string: Hold the tablet in landscape orientation while pointing the rear-facing camera at the switchgear. Adjust your position so that the entire switchgear or the desired switchgear component is in the tabletâ€™s field of vision. When the switchgear/component is recognized, the tablet will overlay the corresponding operating conditions."
The restart button will reinitialize the recognition process. Use this when you have trouble recognizing a component or the camera won\'t focus.
The capture button will freeze the current frame so you can view the values without holding the camera in front of the switchgear.
Please refer to the AR Dashboard documentation to learn about the setup process when using this application for the first time on a new switchboard.
